journal.name: Personal Journal
journal.description: A small leather-bound journal perfect for recording your adventures.
journal.readableText: The journal is empty, ready for your first entry.

guild_logbook.name: Guild Logbook
guild_logbook.description: A thick book used to record guild activities and member contributions.
guild_logbook.readableText: This logbook chronicles the history of the guild.

message_scroll.name: Message Scroll
message_scroll.description: A rolled parchment scroll for leaving messages.

tavern_guestbook.name: Tavern Guestbook
tavern_guestbook.description: A well-worn guestbook where travelers leave their mark.
tavern_guestbook.readableText: Many travelers have signed this guestbook over the years. The pages are mostly empty now.

recipe_book.name: Recipe Book
recipe_book.description: A cookbook for sharing recipes and cooking tips.
recipe_book.readableText: This recipe book awaits culinary wisdom.

tome_of_wisdom.name: Tome of Wisdom
tome_of_wisdom.description: A grand tome where sages record their knowledge.
tome_of_wisdom.readableText: This ancient tome contains the collected wisdom of many generations.

wanted_poster.name: Wanted Poster
wanted_poster.description: A poster for announcing bounties and wanted criminals.
wanted_poster.readableText: This poster is blank, waiting for a bounty to be posted.

ship_log.name: Ship's Log
ship_log.description: A captain's log for recording voyages and discoveries.
ship_log.readableText: The log is ready to record new voyages.

love_letter.name: Love Letter
love_letter.description: A delicate piece of parchment for writing heartfelt messages.
love_letter.readableText: The letter is blank, awaiting words of love.

quest_diary.name: Quest Diary
quest_diary.description: A diary specifically for tracking quest progress and discoveries.
quest_diary.readableText: This diary will help you track your quests and adventures.

magic_grimoire.name: Blank Grimoire
magic_grimoire.description: A grimoire for recording magical discoveries and spell notes.

trade_ledger.name: Trade Ledger
trade_ledger.description: A ledger for tracking trades, debts, and business deals.
trade_ledger.readableText: This ledger is ready to record transactions.

sticky_note.name: Sticky Note
sticky_note.description: A small piece of paper for quick notes.

travelers_guide.name: Traveler's Guide
travelers_guide.description: A guidebook where travelers share tips about locations and dangers.
travelers_guide.readableText: This guide is waiting for travelers to share their experiences.

memorial_stone.name: Memorial Stone
memorial_stone.description: A stone tablet where fallen heroes are remembered.
memorial_stone.readableText: In memory of those who gave their all.
